docs.summary:
The Purchase History API provides a list of your user's purchase history for your app (particularly relevant for one-time purchases).
Note: Cancellations of recurring plans are not included.

params.name: productId
params.doc: Product to bill the user for (details taken from Developers Center).

docs.summary:
The Wix Billing API enables your app to lead customers seamlessly into Wix's checkout process from your platform (e.g., hosting your app's pricing page independently and redirecting to Wix checkout for purchase).
The returned checkout link is valid for 48 hours.
Note: Use of this functionality is dependent on [setup in the Wix Developers Center](https://devforum.wix.com/en/article/setting-up-an-external-pricing-page).

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency to use, ISO-4217.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price to use with the override. Leave empty to use the app's default pricing plan from the Wix Developers Center.

members.name: offlineProviderEnabled
members.doc: Whether there are any offline payment providers enabled - specifically, whether the site accepts cash payments on premises.

members.name: onlineProviderEnabled
members.doc: Whether there are any online payment providers enabled. This includes things like Wix Payments, Stripe, PayPal, Credit Card providers and more.

members.name: thirdPartyPosProviderEnabled
members.doc: Whether there are any third-party point-of-sale providers enabled, allowing customers to make electronic payments in person.

members.name: wixPosProviderEnabled
members.doc: Whether the Wix point-of-sale provider is enabled, allowing customers to make electronic payments in person.

members.name: billingCycle
members.doc: Billing cycle (MONTHLY/YEARLY/ONE_TIME).

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: ISO-3166-1 alpha-2. Defaults to "US".

members.name: couponCode
members.doc: Coupon Code if there is a discount for this product

members.name: languageCode
members.doc: ISO-639-1. Defaults to "en".

members.name: successUrl
members.doc: URL to redirect user to after a successful purchase.

members.name: testCheckout
members.doc: Whether this checkout is for testing purposes only (relevant only for in-app purchases). When true, the price charged will be 0.00.

members.name: billingCycle
members.doc: Billing cycle (MONTHLY/YEARLY/ONE_TIME).

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: ISO-3166-1 alpha-2. Defaults to "US".

members.name: couponCode
members.doc: Coupon Code if there is a discount for this product

members.name: languageCode
members.doc: ISO-639-1. Defaults to "en".

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product to bill the user for (details taken from Developers Center).

members.name: successUrl
members.doc: URL to redirect user to after a successful purchase.

members.name: testCheckout
members.doc: Whether this checkout is for testing purposes only (relevant only for in-app purchases). When true, the price charged will be 0.00.

members.name: checkoutUrl
members.doc: Wix checkout URL based on the parameters in the request.

members.name: token
members.doc: The token holds all the data about the order you want to create the checkout for.  It is signed, so you could verify that it came from Wix.

members.name: billingCycle
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'MONTHLY'`
- `'NO_CYCLE'`
- `'ONE_TIME'`
- `'YEARLY'`

members.name: currency
members.doc: Payment currency.

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: Order date.

members.name: price
members.doc: Product price.

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product ID.
